EmailTemplate.name: 201807_APAC_ATR HOC_il.201808_APAC_ATR_SaveTheDate_HOC_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited to Two 2018 Honeywell ATR Operator Conferences in China and Malaysia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>SAVE THE DATE | 2018 HONEYWELL OPERATOR CONFERENCES - ASIA PACIFIC
Dear customer,
Honeywell is hosting two Operator Conferences in Asia and we are inviting our airlines customers to join this two-day workshop. 2018 Honeywell Operator Conferences in Asia Pacific
- October 16-17 | Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
- October 23-24 | Haikou, China
Each conference will cover keynotes on technical, reliability, technology and customer support updates. Our global product support experts will be participating in these discussions.
The official invite with a detailed agenda of topics, as well as the venue information, will be emailed to you in a few weeks.
We look forward to seeing you at this exciting event in October!
Honeywell Event Team
